Name: Battle Imagine - Phantom Arachnocrab
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Phantom Arachnocrab's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Cocoon Technique.

Arcane! Cocoon Technique
Summon Boss: Phantom Arachnocrab, which turns into a cocoon. After a short delay, the cocoon bursts, dealing Attack Damage. Your Mastery is increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Phantom Arachnocrab's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Cocoon Technique.

Arcane! Cocoon Technique
Summon Boss: Phantom Arachnocrab, which turns into a cocoon. After a short delay, the cocoon bursts, dealing Attack Damage. Your Mastery is increased for a period.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
